mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT P.PRODUCT_NUMBER,P.PRODUCT_NAME,P.PRODUCT_SUBTITLE, P.PRODUCT_DISCOUNT, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, JPIM.PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_NUMBER, JPIM.PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_NAME, JPIM.PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_PATH, JPIM.PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN_UUID FROM JUMAK_PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN JUMAK_PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN JPIM ON P.PRODUCT_NUMBER = JPIM.PRODUCT_NUMBER JOIN JUMAK_PRODUCT_CATEGORY JPC ON P.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER = JPC.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER LEFT JOIN JUMAK_PRODUCT_TAG JPT ON P.PRODUCT_NUMBER = JPT.PRODUCT_NUMBER LEFT JOIN JUMAK_PRODUCT_KEYWORD JPK ON JPT.PRODUCT_KEYWORD_NUMBER = JPK.PRODUCT_KEYWORD_NUMBER WHERE ( P.PRODUCT_NAME || P.PRODUCT_SUBTITLE || P.PRODUCT_ALCOHOLICITY || P.PRODUCT_AREA || P.PRODUCT_DISTILLERY || P.PRODUCT_RAW_MATERIAL ) LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR JPC.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR JPK.PRODCUT_KEYWORD_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT P.PRODUCT_NUMBER) FROM JUMAK_PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN JUMAK_PRODUCT_IMG_MAIN JPIM ON P.PRODUCT_NUMBER = JPIM.PRODUCT_NUMBER JOIN JUMAK_PRODUCT_CATEGORY JPC ON P.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER = JPC.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER LEFT JOIN JUMAK_PRODUCT_TAG JPT ON P.PRODUCT_NUMBER = JPT.PRODUCT_NUMBER LEFT JOIN JUMAK_PRODUCT_KEYWORD JPK ON JPT.PRODUCT_KEYWORD_NUMBER = JPK.PRODUCT_KEYWORD_NUMBER WHERE ( P.PRODUCT_NAME || P.PRODUCT_SUBTITLE || P.PRODUCT_ALCOHOLICITY || P.PRODUCT_AREA || P.PRODUCT_DISTILLERY || P.PRODUCT_RAW_MATERIAL ) LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR JPC.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR JPK.PRODCUT_KEYWORD_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT PRODUCT_NUMBER, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_ALCOHOLICITY, PRODUCT_NET_WEIGHT, PRODUCT_SUBTITLE FROM JUMAK_PRODUCT
WHERE PRODUCT_NUMBER = ANY( SELECT T.PRODUCT_NUMBER FROM JUMAK_PRODUCT_TAG T LEFT JOIN JUMAK_PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NUMBER IN (#{productCategoryNumber1}, #{productCategoryNumber2}) AND T.PRODUCT_NUMBER = P.PRODUCT_NUMBER WHERE T.PRODUCT_KEYWORD_NUMBER IN
#{tag}
GROUP BY T.PRODUCT_NUMBER HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT PRODUCT_KEYWORD_NUMBER) = #{count} )

SELECT NEWS_TITLE, NEWS_DATE,NEWS_IMG_PATH, NEWS_IMG_UUID, NEWS_IMG_NAME FROM ( SELECT NEWS.NEWS_TITLE, NEWS.NEWS_DATE ,I.NEWS_IMG_PATH, I.NEWS_IMG_UUID, I.NEWS_IMG_NAME FROM JUMAK_NEWS NEWS JOIN JUMAK_NEWS_IMG I on NEWS.NEWS_NUMBER = I.NEWS_NUMBER ORDER BY NEWS.NEWS_DATE DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM <= 4

SELECT MADANG_NUMBER, MADANG_TITLE, MADANG_DATE, MADANG_IMG_NAME, MADANG_IMG_PATH, MADANG_IMG_UUID, MADANG_CATEGORY_NAME FROM( SELECT M.MADANG_NUMBER, M.MADANG_TITLE, M.MADANG_DATE, JMI.MADANG_IMG_NAME, JMI.MADANG_IMG_PATH, JMI.MADANG_IMG_UUID, JMC.MADANG_CATEGORY_NAME FROM JUMAK_MADANG M LEFT JOIN JUMAK_MADANG_IMG JMI on M.MADANG_NUMBER = JMI.MADANG_NUMBER JOIN JUMAK_MADANG_CATEGORY JMC on JMC.MADANG_CATEGORY_NUMBER = M.MADANG_CATEGORY_NUMBER ORDER BY M.MADANG_DATE DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM <= 6
